name: Gauss AutoCannon, Crewed, Disposable, Advanced (ADGaCC-21)
description: An advanced crewed disposable gauss auto-cannon. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
